sentences.en: "Opium" is a provocative, sensual, and voluptuous fragrance which makes all your senses vibrate.
sentences.cn: “鸦片”是一种刺激性的、能引起感官快感的香料，能使你所有的感官兴奋起来。

sentences.en: A sensual musical journey combining elements of ritual, dream and myth.
sentences.cn: 译:有着梦和神话般的元素,是精神对失去世界的一次旅行.

sentences.en: Animals deal only in sensual pleasure and are by instinct impelled to seek it.
sentences.cn: 动物只有感觉的快乐,本能推动它们去寻求这种快感.

sentences.en: Anton the chef concocts a sensual coupling of lobster and asparagus.
sentences.cn: 厨师安东用龙虾和芦笋搭配，制作出了一道口感很好的菜肴。

sentences.en: Gus stood without speaking and Bigger felt a curious sensation - half - sensual, half - thoughtful.
sentences.cn: 格斯站在那儿一声不响,贝格感到一种奇特的感觉 -- 一半是肉体上的, 一半是精神上的.

sentences.en: He was a very sensual person.
He was darkly sensual and mysterious.
sentences.cn: 他耽于肉欲，而且让人捉摸不透。

sentences.en: It was an opera, very glamorous and very sensual.
sentences.cn: 这场歌剧美轮美奂，声色俱佳，给感官以极大享受。
意大利吹嘘感官上的美.

sentences.en: She had a lazy sensual body.
sentences.cn: 她总是懒洋洋的,富于肉感.

sentences.en: She has a round sensual face.
sentences.cn: 她有一张极富风情的圆脸.

sentences.en: the faint smile on his sensual mouth
sentences.cn: 他性感的嘴上的淡淡微笑

sentences.en: The season does induce a quickening of the blood and a heightening of humankind's sensual pleasures.
sentences.cn: 这个季节的确会加速血液循环、提高人们感官的兴奋程度.

sentences.en: the sensual pleasure of good food
They are sensual with an unashamed violence that leaves you breathless.
sentences.cn: 它们是肉感的,简直大胆到不顾廉耻的地方,叫你看了目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: They were of a cheaper, a slightly more sensual and cruder, grade.
sentences.cn: 他们属于比较低级, 偏重肉欲而且较为粗俗的那等人.

words.tran_cn: 感觉的；知觉的；传递感觉的
感觉上的，依感观的；诉诸美感的
感觉中枢；知觉器官；感觉器官
好色；淫荡；喜爱感官享受
使变成好色；使耽溺于肉欲；使荒淫
感觉的；肉欲的；世俗的；感觉论的

trans.tran_cn: 感觉的，肉欲的，肉体上的，色情的，淫荡的，世俗的
trans.tran_en: interested in or making you think of physical pleasure, especially sexual pleasure
